name: Demon Baby
description:
You wake up in a hospital room. You are amnesiac, confused, and hungry. A creepy cry of a crawler is haunting you while you explore this seemingly abandoned hospital... is this place haunted or is your weak mind playing tricks on you?

MOVE WITH ARROWS

RUN WITH SHIFT

INTERACT WITH Z

OPEN/CLOSE THE MENU WITH X

All asstes used (tilesets, music, sounds) were either part of RPG Maker MZ or are public domain assets.

To play, download the .zip file below and run the Game.exe after unpacking.
